name: Harlot's Diary
storyline:
Without a penny and no one to turn to for help, a stranger offers you an opportunity to avoid ending up on the streets: becoming a prostitute.
As in any job, not just those of ill repute, it's crucial to master the necessary skills to survive, and in this case, it's a literal matter. Get to know your clients, nightspots, and environment thoroughly to achieve success; even modify your appearance to attract more suitors. However, never neglect your mental health.

In a ruthless world where you've lost everything, only desperate measures remain. Fight to survive as a sex worker and reach the top, avoiding deceit, murderers, and abuse on your path to success.
summary: In a ruthless world where you've lost everything, only desperate measures remain. Fight to survive as a sex worker and reach the top, avoiding deceit, murderers, and abuse on your path to success.
